meanings.sent1: The multiemployers in our town provide job opportunities for many people.
meanings.sent2: The multiemployers in the city are looking to expand their workforce.
meanings.sent3: The multiemployers held a meeting to discuss hiring new staff members.
meanings.sent4: The concept of multiemployers is like having a team of businesses working together to support the community.
meanings.sent5: When you think of multiemployers, imagine a group of employers collaborating to create more job openings.

meanings.definition: A group of employers who jointly participate in providing benefits to employees.
meanings.sent1: The multiemployers decided to offer health insurance to all their employees.
meanings.sent2: Being part of a group of multiemployers can help in providing better benefits to workers.
meanings.sent3: The multiemployers organized a picnic for all the employees to enjoy the benefits of working together.
meanings.sent4: Joining the multiemployers is like joining a club where everyone pitches in to support each other.
meanings.sent5: The idea of multiemployers is to create a network of employers working together for the well-being of their staff.

meanings.definition: An organization that represents multiple employers in negotiations with labor unions.
meanings.sent1: The multiemployers' association successfully negotiated better terms for their member companies.
meanings.sent2: The role of the multiemployers' organization is crucial in labor union discussions.
meanings.sent3: During the negotiation, the multiemployers' group presented a united front to the labor unions.
meanings.sent4: The multiemployers' organization acts as a shield for individual employers in facing labor union demands.
meanings.sent5: In the world of labor negotiations, the multiemployers' group plays a vital role in protecting the interests of many companies.
